de.ralleytn.simple.input

Class XIMouseControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.input.MouseControl
      • de.ralleytn.simple.input.XIMouseControl

  • public class XIMouseControl
extends MouseControl
    An extended MouseControl that will invert up and down cursor movement. This class was made to deal with the inverted up and down of XInput gamepads.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)
